data.title: 1-Minute Breath
data.text: Sit down and get cozy. Soothe yourself for 1 minute with 5 rounds of 6-second breaths. On the next screens watch the candle flame flicker. Breathe in as the candle glows. Breathe out as the candle dims.

data.title: Breathe in, then out as the flame dances.
3 in, 3 out. Feel lighter with each breath.

achievements.title: You've earned a 1-Minute Breath badge of honor.

achievementMessages.message: Think about practicing your breathing 1 or 2 times per day.
achievementMessages.headline: BAM.

achievementMessages.message: Take a healthy breath whenever you’re feeling stressed.
achievementMessages.headline: Are you feeling calm as a clam?

achievementMessages.message: Feel that connection with your deeper, calmer body rhythms.
achievementMessages.headline: Calm, cool, collected, you are. Stress is slipping away.

achievementMessages.message: You’re calming your fight or flight response by activating your parasympathetic nervous system.
achievementMessages.headline: OHM-mazing.

achievementMessages.message: At work or home, take a calming breath before you do that next task.
achievementMessages.headline: Fantastic job. Take your breath everywhere.

achievementMessages.message: Don’t forget. In our crazy-stressful day-to-days, there’s a simple tool to melt away stress: breathing.
achievementMessages.headline: Huzzah! Keep at it.

achievementMessages.message: Keep controlling what you can instead of what you cannot: Your breath.
achievementMessages.headline: Right on!

achievementMessages.message: Before kicking up your feet, take a moment to relax and reflect first. Sit up straight, sip in a breath and notice how you feel.
achievementMessages.headline: You’re a breath of fresh air.

achievementMessages.message: Add a minute of 6-second breaths to your hectic day.
achievementMessages.headline: WHOOSH. Time to let go and just do.

achievementMessages.message: Schedule a breathe break first thing in the morning or over your lunch hour. Set a reminder.
achievementMessages.headline: Way to do!

activitySubCategory.name: Breathe
activitySubCategory.description: 3 in, 3 out. De-stress with some do.

data.title: 18-Second Breath
data.text: Breathe in and out for 18 seconds. It’s easy to do. Puff in as the fish grows. Puff out as the fish blows bubbles.

achievements.title: Keep puffing away with a 18-Second Breath Badge.

achievementMessages.message: That’s because — when at rest — the average person consumes 7 to 8 liters of air per minute.
achievementMessages.headline: You did it! And before you jet, did you feel the size of your lungs expand?

achievementMessages.message: Feel that connection with your deeper, calmer body rhythms.
achievementMessages.headline: Calm, cool, collected, you are. Stress is slipping away.

achievementMessages.message: Spread the love: Breathe in to reset your mood and give others a little sunshine.
achievementMessages.headline: Notice how refreshed you feel? People “catch” happiness from happy people.

achievementMessages.message: Before kicking up your feet, take a moment to relax and reflect first. Sit up straight, sip in a breath and notice how you feel.
achievementMessages.headline: You’re a breath of fresh air.

achievementMessages.message: That is the magical power of focused breathing.
achievementMessages.headline: Do you notice how “in the moment” you are?

achievementMessages.message: Feel that sweet, sweet release.
achievementMessages.headline: It's like the heavens have parted.

achievementMessages.message: Next time try closing your eyes and picturing your favorite place.
achievementMessages.headline: You’re a breathing machine!

achievementMessages.message: Keep de-stressing with a little do.
achievementMessages.headline: Say it with me: OHM.

achievementMessages.message: Make your car a stationary sanctuary the next time you’re stopped in traffic. Turn off your radio and take a few 6-second breaths. Now that traffic has got nothing on you.
achievementMessages.headline: Take your do. on the road.

achievementMessages.message: So why stop now? do. more, fear less.
achievementMessages.headline: Boom! It’s easy as 18 seconds to let go of all that stress.

achievementMessages.message: That incredibly freeing feeling floating through the air around here? That’s stress-free living.
achievementMessages.headline: Way to rock your do.

data.text: Time for a mental cat nap. Re-focus your mind with six 6-second breaths. As Fluffy breathes in, do the same. As she breathes out, so should you.

data.title: 6-Second Breath
data.text: Stress less. Breathe. Yes, taking a 6-second breath — 3 seconds in, 3 seconds out — is an easy way to calm your mind and feel better.

data.title: Let's focus... get ready to breathe.

data.title: At-Work Wrist Stretch
data.text: Even your wrists need stress-relief — especially if you’re on a computer all day. Take 20 seconds to release tension and congratulate yourself for a job well done.

data.title: Set your phone where you can follow along.
Ready, set, stretch.
data.text: Easy part first: sit or stand straight.

data.title: Now, stretch your arm forward with your palm facing up.
Gently pull your fingers back toward you.
Do it with your other hand.

achievements.title: High five! You've earned an At-Work Wrist Stretch Badge.

achievementMessages.message: Stretching your wrist tendons and muscles daily can prevent your wrists from tightening and causing future health issues.
achievementMessages.headline: Thumbs up! You deserve a High Five.

achievementMessages.message: Did you know you could be helping prevent painful conditions like carpel tunnel syndrome? It affects 3% of women and 2% of men in their lifetime.
achievementMessages.headline: Keep stretching to strengthen your wrists.

achievementMessages.message: Try this stretch before work, at lunch and prior to bed.
achievementMessages.headline: Nice work. Keep doing yourself a solid.

achievementMessages.message: Speaking of work: Keep your wrists straight and neutral when typing. Then feel the difference it makes.
achievementMessages.headline: Way to work it!

achievementMessages.message: And make it a stretch while you’re down there — but don’t overdo it.
achievementMessages.headline: Take a bow!

achievementMessages.message: Try another stretch to improve your flexibility.
achievementMessages.headline: Congrats! Keep daring yourself to do more.

achievementMessages.message: Flexibility is a big part of avoiding injury. That’s one way that doing more improves your range of mobility.
achievementMessages.headline: Feel the flex.

achievementMessages.message: Notice how your wrist is grooving these days.
achievementMessages.headline: Feel the fruits of your labor paying off.

achievementMessages.message: Yep, your wrist has more than 1, including 8 carpal bones.
achievementMessages.headline: Way to work your wrist joints.

achievementMessages.message: Now try holding each stretch for up to 30 seconds to get even more benefit.
achievementMessages.headline: Nice goin’ stretch!

achievementMessages.message: They not only bend your wrists but help you curl your fingers and thumbs too.
achievementMessages.headline: You deserve a standing ovation for moving your flexor tendons.

achievementMessages.message: It uses a healthy range of motion. Keep stretching to perfect your next parade wave.
achievementMessages.headline: A proper “elbow, elbow, wrist, wrist” requires more than a pageant title.

achievementMessages.message: Pat yourself on the back for a job well done.
achievementMessages.headline: Feeling fearless lately? It’s all that stretching.

achievementMessages.message: Simple stretches like this make activities like driving your car or picking up a glass of water easier each day.
achievementMessages.headline: You’re practically a marathoner!

achievementMessages.message: Bonus keyboard trick: Float your hands when you type. Resting your wrists on a desk stresses them out!  Ready, set, float.
achievementMessages.headline: A job well done.

activitySubCategory.name: Stretch
activitySubCategory.description: Easy is as easy does. Try simple stretches.

data.title: Be Chill
data.text: Guess what? 39% of Americans live in a county directly on the shoreline. It’s no wonder: Water helps people chill and be calm. Dive into your inner vibes with a simple 20-second meditation.

data.title: Guess what?
data.text:
39% of Americans live in a county directly on the shoreline.

It’s no wonder: Water helps people chill and be calm.

Dive into your inner vibes with a simple 20-second meditation.

data.title: Clear your mind. Soften your eyes and eyebrows.
Glide through the ocean. Be one with the current.

achievements.title: You’ve leveled up with a Be Chill Badge.

achievementMessages.message: And, before you go, a fun fact: 19th century doctors prescribed long ocean voyages or beach vacations as an illness cure.
achievementMessages.headline: Let the calm wash over you…

achievementMessages.message: Keep at it by finding a few moments at work and home to clear your mind.
achievementMessages.headline: You just finished a mental workout!

achievementMessages.message: You’re reversing your stress response — lowering the effects of chronic stress in your life. Return to it when you need to focus.
achievementMessages.headline: You’re doing more than repeating a mantra.

achievementMessages.message: Stay in the moment as long as you can.
achievementMessages.headline: Feeling a little flighty? That’s just big ol’ bliss rolling around in your head.

achievementMessages.message: A 2014 research review suggested meditation can help regulate our immune system.
achievementMessages.linkText: Check out its many other benefits.
achievementMessages.headline: AHHH. Keep feeling cool, calm and collected.

achievementMessages.message: Keep doing just that. Focus on the task at hand — you’ll be surprised how much more you accomplish.
achievementMessages.headline: Notice how in the moment you are? Yeah you do!

achievementMessages.message: That’s because you’re lowering your stress and improving your focus. Keep meditating to chill more in your day.
achievementMessages.headline: Can you feel your heart pitter-patter a lil’ slower?

achievementMessages.message: Return to the rhythm of your heartbeat when you need a moment to reset. Add a reminder to meditate daily.
achievementMessages.headline: Way to do.

achievementMessages.message: Consistency will get you the most bang for your buck when starting a mindfulness practice. Find a comfy spot, sit upright and simply “be”. It’s that easy.
achievementMessages.headline: Practice makes perfect.

achievementMessages.message: Come back here often when you need to reflect or brighten your mood.
achievementMessages.headline: You did it! You just found your happy place.

activitySubCategory.description: Be mindful. Be present. And find “me” time.

data.text: Find bliss and feel better with a simple visual. Focus your energy on the next screen. Take in the words and visual together. Breathe slowly. Be soothed.
data.title: Bliss Out
Life is a circle, life is fluid.

achievements.title: Be rewarded with a Bliss Out Badge.

achievementMessages.message: Focus on the task at hand — you’ll be surprised how much more you accomplish.
achievementMessages.headline: Notice how in the moment you are? Yeah you do! Keep doing just that.

achievementMessages.message: A 2012 study found long-term meditators have more folds in the outer layer of their brains. The more folds, the better one processes info. How cool is that?
achievementMessages.headline: Do more with more brain power.

achievementMessages.message: Try it first thing in the AM to prepare for your day or right before bed for a sound slumber.
achievementMessages.headline: Improved focus, more resilience. That’s what happens when you meditate daily.

achievementMessages.message: That’s because you’re lowering your stress and improving your focus. Keep meditating to chill more in your day.
achievementMessages.headline: Can you feel your heart pitter-patter a lil’ slower?

achievementMessages.message: Quick tip: If you at first can’t relax your jaw muscles, clench them first. Then release. Counter-intuitive, yes. Super-effective, double-yes.
achievementMessages.headline: Zen-master in the making. That’s how you relax.

achievementMessages.message: Come back here often when you need to reflect or brighten your mood.
achievementMessages.headline: You did it! You just found your happy place.

achievementMessages.message: Practice in a peaceful setting to get more in-tune with your inner chatter.

achievementMessages.headline: Way to do.

name: Do It to It Quad Stretch

data.title: Do It To It Quad Stretch
data.text: Got 20 seconds? That’s all it takes to work your core and front thigh (quads). All while standing on 1 foot. You got this.

data.title: Set your phone where you can follow along.
Stand up straight.
data.text: Use a wall, desk or small friend for balance.

data.title: Grab your ankle.
data.text: Bring it up. And hold.

data.title: And that’s all it takes.
data.text: Time to celebrate!

achievements.title: Feel the burn with your new Do It to It Quad Stretch Badge.

achievementMessages.message: Now, add a reminder to stretch your quads to improve your flexibility and balance.
achievementMessages.headline: You did it!

achievementMessages.message: Remember to keep a slight knee bend when standing on 1 leg. You’ll protect your knee and add more spring to your stretch!
achievementMessages.headline: Way to do!

achievementMessages.message: This stretch is steadying your knee joints, which makes things like climbing the stairs easier.
achievementMessages.headline: Are your legs feeling stronger lately? That’s all you!

achievementMessages.message: Don’t forget to breathe when you stretch. Not only will it help you balance, it will improve your focus.
achievementMessages.headline: Now that’s true do. power.

achievementMessages.message: Stretching your front thighs improves your circulation and flexibility. Do 2X more. Stand ‘er up.
achievementMessages.headline: 2-for-1s are for more than just happy hour.

achievementMessages.message: Add another 5 seconds to each quad, working your way to 15 seconds on each leg.
achievementMessages.headline: Atta-doer… Keep it up and stretch your stretch.

achievementMessages.message: Level up your front thigh stretch. Try it without a support for balance.
achievementMessages.headline: BAM. That’s some impressive stretching.

achievementMessages.message: Press all corners of your standing foot into the floor (don’t pinch your toes!) to balance better.
achievementMessages.headline: Strengthen more than your thigh. And let your stretch feel stretch-ier.

achievementMessages.message: And when all 4 are tight, you may feel an imbalance between your thighs, hamstrings and buns.
achievementMessages.headline: Did you know? You’re stretching 4 large and powerful quadriceps muscles.

achievementMessages.message: Plan a walk around the block and stretch beforehand. Use each other’s shoulders for balance. And maybe share a joke or two.
achievementMessages.headline: Way to get physical. Try the stretch out with a pal.

achievementMessages.message: By pulling in your abs you’ll strengthen your core and enhance balance.
achievementMessages.headline: Way to work it. Next time, suck it in to power up your core.

activitySubCategory.name: Stretch
activitySubCategory.description: Easy is as easy does. Try simple stretches.

data.title: Dream Big
data.text: Life IS busy. Which makes it easy to lose grasp of our hopes and dreams. Refocus your efforts by noticing the little things. Like your heartbeat.

data.title: Repeat:
data.text:
The following statement (called a “mantra”) 5 times in your mind.

Or as long as you need.

data.title: I’m a heartbeat away from my truest desire.

achievements.title: Nice work! Add a Dream Big Badge to stash.

achievementMessages.message: A 2014 research review suggested meditation can help regulate our immune system.
achievementMessages.headline: AHHH. Keep feeling cool, calm and collected.

achievementMessages.message: The next time a negative thought pops up come back to a simple phrase or mantra. Your dreams will be in grasp before you know it.
achievementMessages.linkText: Read simple ways to stress less.
achievementMessages.headline: Keep at it!

achievementMessages.message: And, before you go, a fun fact: 19th century doctors prescribed long ocean voyages or beach vacations to cure illness.
achievementMessages.headline: Let the calm wash over you…

achievementMessages.message: Picture what success looks like for something you aim to do. Jack Nicklaus swung every shot in his mind before playing… and look where that got him!
achievementMessages.headline: Nirvana, found. Use visualization to up your game.

achievementMessages.message: You’re reversing your stress response — lowering the effects of chronic stress in your life. Return to it when you need to focus.
achievementMessages.headline: You’re doing more than repeating a mantra.

achievementMessages.message: If you have a goal you’ve been putting it off, put it on paper. Draw it out, take a photo or make a diagram to create a mental image that motivates you.
achievementMessages.headline: Your life is as big as your imagination!

achievementMessages.message: That’s just big ol’ bliss rolling around in your head. Stay in the moment as long as you can.
achievementMessages.headline: Feeling a little flighty?

achievementMessages.message: Quick tip: If you at first can’t relax your jaw muscles, clench them first. Then release. Counter-intuitive, yes. Super-effective, double-yes.
achievementMessages.headline: Zen-master in the making. That’s how you meditate.

achievementMessages.message: Consistency will get you the most bang for your buck when starting a mindfulness practice. Find a comfy spot, sit upright and simply “be”. It’s that easy.
achievementMessages.headline: Practice makes perfect.

achievementMessages.message: Did you notice your mind wander a bit? That’s A-OK. It’s a GOOD thing. A wandering mind gives you a nudge to refocus on your breath, mantra or visual. Keep at it and sit with your thoughts.
achievementMessages.headline: Nicely done.

activitySubCategory.name: Reflect
activitySubCategory.description: Be mindful. Be present. And find “me” time.

data.text: Your phone can connect you to more than friends and family. It can also connect you to better health. Use it to do an easy bicep curl.
data.title: Flip Phone Bicep Curl
Ready, set, curl
data.text: Keep your phone handy. Stand up. OK. Shoulders straight.

data.title: Start on your left side.
data.text: Lower your phone to your hip. Keep your elbow close, wrist straight.

data.title: Tighten your phone grip — just a little, palm up.
data.text: Curl your phone to your shoulder.

data.title: Lower it down.
data.text: Maintain a slight elbow bend.

data.title: Do 12 repetitions on the other side.

achievements.title: Flex your biceps, get a Flip Phone Curl Badge.

achievementMessages.message: A simple bicep curl can work your abs, glutes, triceps, shoulders and more.
achievementMessages.headline: That’s what we call beast mode.

achievementMessages.message: Next time do it without your phone. Make a fist to use even more muscle mojo.
achievementMessages.headline: Pro wrestlers have nothing on you.

achievementMessages.message: Feel your arm building strength and increasing flexibility. That’s living fearless.
achievementMessages.headline: Way to do more daily!

achievementMessages.message: These micro-actions are helping you improve your well-being. Repeat a few times per week.
achievementMessages.headline: Total body awesomeness.

achievementMessages.message: Use a household item, like a soup can, to challenge your biceps.
achievementMessages.headline: Congrats! Add more weight to your palm the next time you flex.

achievementMessages.message: “I don’t play to sweat, I play to win.” - Kevin Garnett (Source: BrainyQuote)
achievementMessages.headline: That’s flexing like a true athlete.

achievementMessages.message: Flex the next time you get ready in the morning to start your day strong and confident.
achievementMessages.headline: Put another feather in your cap!

achievementMessages.message: Curl your arm on the road, at work or even relaxing with your family and friends.
achievementMessages.headline: Just like your phone, take your bicep curl everywhere.

achievementMessages.message: Do this simple static stretch to keep feeling strong and balanced.
achievementMessages.headline: You’ve got the right stuff.

achievementMessages.message: Make a fist instead of holding your phone to strengthen more muscles and de-stress.
achievementMessages.headline: Squeeze out some stress in your day.

achievementMessages.message: Pay attention to your breath as you stretch. Breathing will deepen your stretch while helping you relax.
achievementMessages.headline: You’ll be back. For more do.

achievementMessages.message: Try something new: Add another do. activity to your day to get extra groovy health benefits.
achievementMessages.headline: You’re a machine.

achievementMessages.message: You’re on your way to doing more while fearing even less.
achievementMessages.headline: This is what we call stamina.

achievementMessages.message: Even a little flex goes a long way to improve your confidence and posture.
achievementMessages.headline: Totally righteous!

achievementMessages.message: Keep flexing and curling to reap even bigger physical rewards.
achievementMessages.headline: Snap into some do. power.

activitySubCategory.name: Flex
activitySubCategory.description: Do more to fear less with a lil’ muscle flex.

data.text: Ready to get physical? Let’s up that heart rate and stretch those limbs. Totally! Like, no leg warmers required.
data.title: Get Physical
Place your phone so you can follow along.

captions.text: Ok, jog in place. Kick your butt (yeah, fer-sure, it works).
Hands over head! Then down. Repeat.
Back flat, knees bent. Stretch side to side.
Reach and hold both sides. (No need to touch.)
Who’s bustin’ a move like an ‘80s fitness star, now? (Wink.)

achievements.title: END-OF-ACTIVITY

achievementMessages.message: Did you know? Jogging in place can get your heart rate up to 180 beats per min, helping your blood flow easier and lungs breathe better.
achievementMessages.headline: Now, that’s how you do aerobics!

achievementMessages.message: You’re upping your heart rate, stretching your arms and legs and even working your core. Gnarly.
achievementMessages.headline: Talk about a total body workout.

achievementMessages.message: Jane Fonda, award-winning actress and ‘80s workout celeb, sold >17 million copies of her totally tubular workout home video. It’s the best-selling home video of all time.
achievementMessages.headline: Looks silly, feels good!

achievementMessages.message: Grab your kids, your partner or, hey, someone off the street and get your aerobics on.
achievementMessages.headline: Workouts are more fun with a pal.

achievementMessages.message: Modify these moves to fit your body and fitness level. Bend your knees if you need to when moving side to side. Stop if something hurts.
achievementMessages.headline: Sure, we can’t ALL touch our toes.

achievementMessages.message: Working out, even for a few seconds, releases endorphins, which make us feel better and have more energy.
achievementMessages.headline: Way wicked. Keep at it to maintain these good-time feels.

achievementMessages.message: Lift your knees in front of you while swinging your arms up and down. Get your knees above your hips for a greater range of motion.
achievementMessages.headline: Sick of kicking your butt (literally and figuratively)? Try marching in place.

achievementMessages.message: Set a reminder to do these moves every day or a few times a week. See how your range of motion and "stretchiness" improves.
achievementMessages.headline: Way to get physical.

achievementMessages.message: Remember to keep your core active when you jog or stretch. Do so by sucking in your tummy as if you're expecting a gut punch. OUCH! (not really…)
achievementMessages.headline: Way to work it.

data.text: Ready to get physical? Let’s up that heart rate and stretch those limbs. Totally! Like, no leg warmers required.
data.title: Get Physical
Place your phone so you can follow along.
Stand up, arms at your side.
data.text: Ok, jog in place. Kick your butt (yeah, fer-sure, it works).

data.title: Hands over head! Then down. Repeat.
That’s rad! Now jump out.
data.text: Make a T with your arms. Get ready to stretch.

data.title: Keep your back flat. Bend your knees a lil’.
data.text: Move from your hips to reach for knees, ankles or toes.

data.title: Reach and hold both sides. (No need to touch.)
Who’s bustin’ a move like an ‘80s fitness star, now?
data.text: (Wink.)

achievements.title: Way to get physical! Jump for your Get Physical badge.

Talk about a total body workout. 

You’re upping your heart rate, stretching your arms and legs and even working your core. 

Gnarly.

Jane Fonda, award-winning actress and ‘80s workout celeb, sold >17 million copies of her totally tubular workout home video. It’s the best-selling home video of all time.

Workouts are more fun with a pal. 

Grab your kids, your partner or, hey, someone off the street and get your aerobics on.

Sure, we can’t ALL touch our toes. Modify these moves to fit your body and fitness level. 

Bend your knees if you need to when moving side to side. Stop if something hurts.

Way wicked. Working out, even for a few seconds, releases endorphins, which make us feel better and have more energy.

data.title: Good Vibes
data.text: Boost your mood with an easy affirmation. Find a few moments to clear your mind and boost your mood.

Then repeat the words on the next screen as you read them. 

Keep at it until you feel calm.
data.title: Sit up tall. Relax your jaw.

achievements.title: You’ve unlocked the Good Vibes Badge. Peace!

achievementMessages.message: Quick tip: If you at first can’t relax your jaw muscles, clench them first. Then release. Counter-intuitive, yes. Super-effective, double-yes.
achievementMessages.headline: Zen-master in the making. That’s how you meditate.

achievementMessages.message: You’re reversing your stress response — lowering the effects of chronic stress in your life. Return to it when you need to focus.
achievementMessages.headline: You’re doing more than repeating a mantra.

achievementMessages.message: A 2012 study found long-term meditators have more folds in the outer layer of their brains. The more folds, the better one processes info. How cool is that?
achievementMessages.headline: Do more with more brain power.

achievementMessages.message: You took time out of your busy day to focus on you. That's the power of do.
achievementMessages.headline: Pat yourself on the back...

achievementMessages.message: Practice in a peaceful setting to get more in-tune with your inner chatter.
achievementMessages.headline: Meditating helps you do more to fear less.

achievementMessages.message: That’s what happens when you meditate daily. Try it first thing in the AM to prepare for your day or right before bed for a sound slumber.
achievementMessages.headline: Improved focus, more resilience.

achievementMessages.message: Keep at it by finding a few moments at work and home to clear your mind.
achievementMessages.headline: You just finished a mental workout!

achievementMessages.message: Picture what success looks like for something you aim to do. Jack Nicklaus swung every shot in his mind before playing… and look where that got him!
achievementMessages.headline: Nirvana, found. Use visualization to up your game.

achievementMessages.message: Consistency will get you the most bang for your buck when starting a mindfulness practice. Find a comfy spot, sit upright and simply “be”. It’s that easy.
achievementMessages.headline: Practice makes perfect.

achievementMessages.message: That’s just big ol’ bliss rolling around in your head. Stay in the moment as long as you can.
achievementMessages.headline: Feeling a little flighty?

achievementMessages.message: Did you notice your mind wander a bit? That’s A-OK. It’s a GOOD thing. A wandering mind gives you a nudge to refocus on your breath, mantra or visual. Keep at it and sit with your thoughts.
achievementMessages.headline: Nicely done.

activitySubCategory.name: Reflect
activitySubCategory.description: Be mindful. Be present. And find “me” time.

data.title: Hopscotch (Balance)
data.text: Improve your balance while working your leg and core muscles. Stand on 1 leg while lifting the other to bring out your inner child.

data.title: Ready, set, hopscotch.
data.text:
Stand on your right foot, lift your left…

Hop 3 steps.

data.title: That’s top-notch hopscotching.
data.text:
Switch. 

Hop on your left foot for 3 steps.

achievements.title: That's tip-top balance! Hopscotch Badge achieved.

achievementMessages.message: You just worked your leg and core muscles to improve your balance. Try tightening the core around your belly to help you stand on one foot longer.
achievementMessages.headline: Now that’s a true balancing act.

achievementMessages.message: Fearless fact: Satilla Elementary School in Douglas, Ga., holds the world record for the most people to hopscotch at one time: 621. (Source: Guinness World Records)
achievementMessages.headline: Wow! You did it.

achievementMessages.message: Fearless fact: 2,276 is the largest number of people to simultaneously stand on one leg at a single venue.
achievementMessages.linkText: Find out where this record was broken.
achievementMessages.headline: Keep standing tall for your health.

achievementMessages.message: Stand and balance at different intervals throughout the day.
achievementMessages.headline: Congrats! Keep daring yourself to do more.

achievementMessages.message: Imagine what difference that could make for you and the 155 million Americans who play video games? (Source: Venture Beat)
achievementMessages.headline: Dare yourself to stand more. Do it while you game.

achievementMessages.message: Research found that people who stand for at least one-quarter of their day lower their likelihood of obesity.
achievementMessages.headline: Who knew standing could do so much for your health?

achievementMessages.message: Safely hopscotch down the hallway or in your backyard.
achievementMessages.headline: Hopscotch with your family.

achievementMessages.message: Play the next round standing up.
achievementMessages.headline: Make game time (video OR board) more active.

achievementMessages.message: Remember, playing hopscotch, at any time, for any reason, will not be mocked. Unless the reason is really, really funny.
achievementMessages.headline: All done!

achievementMessages.message: Stand and balance at different intervals throughout the day.
achievementMessages.headline: Congrats! Keep daring yourself to do more.

achievementMessages.message: Regularly stand to break up the almost 10 hours Americans sit per day, helping you do way more and fear much less. (Source: Get America Standing)
achievementMessages.headline: Fantastic job.

achievementMessages.message: Do you hear that round of applause? It's because you're doing more by standing frequently.
achievementMessages.headline: Give yourself a standing ovation.

achievementMessages.message: Feel free, as often as you like.
achievementMessages.headline: It’s so easy it kinda makes you want to do it again, doesn’t it?

activitySubCategory.name: Stand
activitySubCategory.description: Stand up for your health. Literally.

data.title: Look Where? There Neck Stretch
data.text: Did you know? 30 seconds is all you need to increase strength and endurance, while decreasing stress. Well, now you do. This stretch tackles those pesky neck kinks.

data.title: First, set your phone where you can read the directions.
Ready, set, do.
data.text: Now, face forward. Shoulders back. Soften your face muscles.

data.title: Alright. Turn your head.
data.text: What’s that in the distance? Pure bliss? You're on your way.

data.title: Okay, look forward again and relax. Whew.
Turn your head the other direction.
data.text:
Remember, keep shoulders back and straight.

Whoa. A whole new view.

achievements.title: Neck gnarls be gone! Look Where? There Stretch Badge added.

achievementMessages.message: Loosen your neck muscles a couple times per day to stretch and de-stress.
achievementMessages.headline: Feel the stress disappearing?

achievementMessages.message: Did you know that stretching like this for just 30 seconds can help prevent injuries? Oh yeah.
achievementMessages.headline: Keep up the good work.

achievementMessages.message: You just improved your range of motion. Keep at it: Stretch when you wake up or before bed.
achievementMessages.headline: Those neck kinks got nothing on you.

achievementMessages.message: Try something new: Add another do. activity to your day to get extra groovy health benefits.
achievementMessages.headline: You’re a machine.

achievementMessages.message: When it comes to stretching, “No pain, no gain” goes out the window. If a stretch suddenly hurts, you’ve pushed too far. Instead, hold your stretch where there is feel-good tension.
achievementMessages.headline: Way to go!

achievementMessages.message: Next time switch it up: Stretch your neck from right to left.
achievementMessages.headline: Nice work! Do you feel the difference?

achievementMessages.message: Notice how strong your neck muscles are becoming.
achievementMessages.headline: Wow. Now, that’s what you call a stretch!

achievementMessages.message: Keep up with these 30-second stretch breaks. Make time to do it at work or at home.
achievementMessages.headline: Oh yeah, now you’re doing more and fearing less.

achievementMessages.message: Well, don’t you look mighty stretched out and healthy these days!
achievementMessages.headline: Nice work! Do you feel the difference?

achievementMessages.message: Try some stretches to cool down and relax your muscles after your next workout.
achievementMessages.headline: These 30-second stretches are adding up to a healthier you.

achievementMessages.message: Why? We spend enough time in our day glued to devices. You’re doing it now! Groove your neck daily to maintain a healthy body.
achievementMessages.headline: Keep it up.

achievementMessages.message: Fun fact: In Aug. 2011, 20,534 people simultaneously stretched their bodies at one time. Dare yourself to stretch with a friend.
achievementMessages.headline: You’re stretching so much you’re wiggly as a stretch band.

achievementMessages.message: It’s recommended you stretch each major muscle group at least 2 times per week for 60 seconds each exercise.
achievementMessages.headline: Super stretch! Try holding a wee-bit longer to get even more benefit.

achievementMessages.message: Stretching increases blood flow to the muscles, helping you do more in your day.
achievementMessages.headline: Feel that free-flowing blood pumping through your body? Yeah you do!

achievementMessages.message: Keep grooving that neck to maintain and improve flexibility as you age.
achievementMessages.headline: Stretching is preventive care for your body.

achievementMessages.message: Add a little dance to your stretch today.
achievementMessages.headline: Move like Jagger!

data.title: Selfie Arm Stretch
data.text: Hey, time for a selfie! Well. Not an actual selfie. A selfie stretch… Think about it. When you take a selfie you’re already stretching. So follow along for 30 seconds and try it out.

data.title: First, stretch your legs. Stand up. Here we go…
Pull your shoulders back and away from your ears.
Now, extend your left arm at shoulder height.
data.text: Feel your upper body wake up.

data.title: Nice work. Switch hands.
data.text: Reach your right arm forward at shoulder height.

achievements.title: Duck faces earn badges, a Selfie Arm Stretch Badge to be exact.

achievementMessages.message: You’re improving your mobility and range of motion every day.
achievementMessages.headline: Nice going, stretch.

achievementMessages.message: Keep grooving that arm to maintain and improve flexibility as you age.

data.title: Simply Stand
data.text: Did you know? Standing up at least once per hour decreases your blood pressure. So ditch your chair. 15 seconds is all it takes.

data.title: Here you are. Standing tall. It’s that easy.

achievements.title: Standing earns rewards: Simply Stand Badge won.

achievementMessages.message: Feel free, as often as you like (but at least once an hour).
achievementMessages.headline: It’s so easy it kinda makes you want to do it again, doesn’t it?

achievementMessages.message: Remember, standing, at any time, for any reason, will not be mocked. Unless the reason is really, really funny.
achievementMessages.headline: All done!

achievementMessages.message: Bonus: A 170-lb person burns more calories per hour when you stand (186 calories) compared to when you sit (139 calories).
achievementMessages.linkText: Learn how to burn extra calories.
achievementMessages.headline: You’ve earned this.

achievementMessages.message: It's helping your ticker tock longer. Keep it up.
achievementMessages.headline: Click clock. All this standing is doing more than you know.

achievementMessages.message: Stand at different intervals throughout the day.
achievementMessages.headline: Congrats! Keep daring yourself to do more.

achievementMessages.message: You’re working your back and leg muscles too.
achievementMessages.headline: You’re doing more than standing there.

achievementMessages.message: Each time you stand you’re adding precious time back to your health.
achievementMessages.headline: Office workers average 10 hours of sitting at work and eating lunch.

achievementMessages.message: Researchers found workers using a standing desk were 46% more productive compared to those who sat. Make time to stand when typing at work or answering email. (Source: Texas A&M)
achievementMessages.headline: You’ve got game. Increase your daily productivity.

achievementMessages.message: All of this standing is reducing your health risks from excessive sitting.
achievementMessages.headline: You deserve a standing ovation.

achievementMessages.message: It could be a sign of dehydration. Drink more water and fluids in your day.
achievementMessages.headline: Whoosh. Do you ever feel dizzy when you stand up?

achievementMessages.message: Set a timer for regular "standing breaks" during your next streaming binge.
achievementMessages.headline: Stand while watching your favorite guilty pleasure.

achievementMessages.message: Park your car further from the office or the grocery store to get more steps in your day.
achievementMessages.headline: Ready to step up your game?

achievementMessages.message: Dare yourself to do more in your day: Stand up when lacing your sneakers. Try it without letting your foot hit the ground.
achievementMessages.headline: Your body thanks you!

achievementMessages.message: Amazing fact of the day: simply standing up can help lower your blood pressure. Score.
achievementMessages.headline: Keep at it.

achievementMessages.message: Try standing during your next phone call or start a trend at the PTA.
achievementMessages.headline: Way to stand up for your health!

achievementMessages.message: Play the next round standing up.
achievementMessages.headline: Make game time (video OR board) more active.

achievementMessages.message: You’re standing as tall as Paul Bunyan and his fav pal, Babe the Blue Ox.
achievementMessages.headline: Imagine the tales that will be written about you.

achievementMessages.headline: Congrats!

achievementMessages.message:
Researchers found workers using a standing desk were 46% more productive compared to those who sat. 

Make time to stand when typing at work or answering email.
achievementMessages.headline: You’ve got game. Increase your daily productivity.

achievementMessages.message: Standing up to 3 to 4 hours in your day is equal to running about 10 marathons per year. Schedule more time to stand.
achievementMessages.headline: WHOA.

achievementMessages.message: It's because you're doing more by standing frequently. Give yourself a standing ovation.
achievementMessages.headline: Do you hear that round of applause?

achievementMessages.message: Do you ever feel dizzy when you stand up? It could be a sign of dehydration. Drink more water and fluids in your day.
achievementMessages.headline: Whoosh.

achievementMessages.message: Set a timer for regular "standing breaks" during your next streaming binge.
achievementMessages.headline: Stand while watching your favorite guilty pleasure.

achievementMessages.message: Take the stairs instead of the elevator the next time you're at work or head to the mall.
achievementMessages.headline: Ready to step up your game?

achievementMessages.message: Dare yourself to do more in your day: Stand up when lacing your sneakers. Do it without letting your foot hit the ground.
achievementMessages.headline: Your body thanks you!

achievementMessages.message: Amazing that simply standing up can help lower your blood pressure.
achievementMessages.headline: Keep at it.

achievementMessages.message: Try standing during your next phone call or start a trend at the PTA.
achievementMessages.headline: Way to stand up for your health!

achievementMessages.message: Play the next round standing up.
achievementMessages.headline: Make game time (video OR board) more active.

achievementMessages.message: We’re giving you a salute.
achievementMessages.headline: Good work, soldier.

achievements.title: Good work, soldier. We’re giving you a Full Salute badge for all the standing you’ve been doing.

activitySubCategory.name: Stand
activitySubCategory.description: Stand up for your health. Literally.

data.title: Standing Meeting
data.text: Did you know? Standing up at least once per hour increases your metabolism. And it’s more fun with a friend.

data.title: Go chat with your neighbor or cube bud.
Share your latest water cooler gossip…

achievements.title: Being a Chatty Cathy pays off with a Standing Meeting Badge.

achievementMessages.message: Feel free, as often as you like (but at least once an hour).
achievementMessages.headline: It’s so easy it kinda makes you want to do it again, doesn’t it?

achievementMessages.message: Bonus: A 170-lb person burns more calories per hour when you stand (186 calories) compared to when you sit (139 calories).
achievementMessages.headline: You’ve earned this.

achievementMessages.message: Fearless fact: 2,276 is the largest number of people to simultaneously stand on one leg at a single venue. (Source: Guinness World Records)
achievementMessages.headline: Keep standing tall for your health.

achievementMessages.message: Stand at different intervals throughout the day.
achievementMessages.headline: Congrats! Keep daring yourself to do more.

achievementMessages.message: Regularly stand to break up the almost 10 hours Americans sit per day, helping you do way more and fear much less.
achievementMessages.headline: Fantastic job.

achievementMessages.message: Standing up to 3 to 4 hours in your day is equal to running about 10 marathons per year.
achievementMessages.headline: Whoa. Schedule more time to stand.

achievementMessages.message: Researchers found workers using a standing desk were 46% more productive compared to those who sat. Make time to stand when typing at work or answering email. (Source: Texas A&M)
achievementMessages.headline: You’ve got game. Increase your daily productivity.

achievementMessages.message: You just worked your leg and core muscles to improve your balance. Try tightening the core around your belly to help you stand stronger and taller.
achievementMessages.headline: Who doesn't love a 2-for-1?

achievementMessages.message: Take the stairs instead of the elevator before your next appointment.
achievementMessages.headline: Stand (and step) more.

achievementMessages.message: Stand up when putting on your dress shoes. Do it without letting your foot hit the ground.
achievementMessages.headline: Your body thanks you!

achievementMessages.message: Click clock: it's helping your ticker tock longer.
achievementMessages.headline: All this standing is doing more than you know

achievementMessages.message: Try standing in your next meeting, and see how others react.
achievementMessages.headline: Way to stand up for your health!

achievementMessages.message: Imagine what difference that could make for you and the 155 million Americans who play video games? (Source: Venture Beat)
achievementMessages.headline: Dare yourself to stand more. Do it while you game.

achievementMessages.message: Back to work…
achievementMessages.headline: OK, fun’s over.

activitySubCategory.name: Stand
activitySubCategory.description: Stand up for your health. Literally.

data.title: Superhero Pose
data.text: Boost your self-esteem. And look fierce doing it. A small change in body language can increase your confidence and lower anxiety. So you can do more in your day.

captions.text: Ready, set, vogue. Stand feet hip width apart.
Puff your chest out, hands on hips.
It’s a bird, it’s a plane, it’s a stronger you…

achievements.title: END-OF-ACTIVITY

achievementMessages.message: You just dropped your cortisol levels, so you can feel more confident in stressful situations.
achievementMessages.headline: Well done! Strike a power pose to live fearlessly.

achievementMessages.message: You just upped your body’s ability to take more risks.
achievementMessages.headline: Winner, winner, chicken dinner.

achievementMessages.message: Take on the world one powerful moment at a time.
achievementMessages.headline: You’re on roll!

achievementMessages.message: You just upped your body’s ability to take more risks.
achievementMessages.headline: Winner, winner, chicken dinner.

achievementMessages.message: "When our body language is confident and open, other people respond in kind, unconsciously reinforcing not only their perception of us but also our perception of ourselves." ~ Amy Cuddy (Source: Inc.)
achievementMessages.headline: Some words of wisdom to keep at it:

achievementMessages.message: Power pose once per day and let your confidence soar. Try it in the mirror before you start your day.
achievementMessages.headline: Fantastic work.

achievementMessages.message: Now keep posing. Even small hand and body gestures shape how others view you.
achievementMessages.headline: You did it.

achievementMessages.message: These tiny changes in body language help you tackle life’s daily surprises.
achievementMessages.headline: Do it ‘til you become it.

achievementMessages.message: That’s the power of do! Share it with family and friends — power pose before the next big game or competition.
achievementMessages.headline: That super-duper invincible feeling you feel after posing?

achievementMessages.message: That means what you’re doing on the outside is changing how you feel on the inside. Ready, set, roar.
achievementMessages.headline: Ready to take on the world? Good!

achievementMessages.message: You’re helping yourself do far more and fear far less. Pose in the middle of your day to prep for those long afternoon meetings.
achievementMessages.headline: Hats off to you!

achievementMessages.message: You’re giving yourself a “body-mind nudge” each time you pose, removing mental road blocks that impact your confidence.
achievementMessages.headline: Keep posing it out!

achievementMessages.message: Strike a power pose before your next challenge to pump you up.
achievementMessages.headline: You’ve earned your place in the superhero universe.

achievementMessages.message: Guess what? Power posing works for the Kenyon College Lords and Ladies swimming team. They power pose to build team support and prep during the racing season. The results? More energy, fun and maybe a faster swim or two.
achievementMessages.headline: Just keep swimming.

achievementMessages.message: You’re ready to unleash the power of your caped crusader at a moment’s notice.
achievementMessages.headline: Bam! Pop! Boom!

achievementMessages.message: Do it up big and go for your goal — or the primo spot in the carpool rotation.
achievementMessages.headline: Feeling fine to let yourself shine.

activitySubCategory.name: Flex
activitySubCategory.description: Do more to fear less with a lil’ muscle flex.

data.title: The Dancing Beast
data.text: Awaken your inner dance beast for 30 seconds. No matter your habitat, dancing has many benefits including increased muscle tone, strength and overall happiness.

data.title: Get ready
data.text: Whether in a quiet den or the great outdoors, find a comfy space to bust your moves out of hibernation and let ‘em roar!

data.title: Scout. Stretch. Groove.
data.text: Scout a good spot to stand with your feet hip-width apart. Stretch your arms and legs. It’s groove time!

data.title: Twist side to side with your arms.
Now twist your legs and arms.
Now, see how low you can go!

achievements.title: You're a dancing machine. Dancing Beast Badge secured.

achievementMessages.message: Unleashing your inner beast also releases endorphins that boost your mood.
achievementMessages.headline: Unleash you! Get the benefits of a little boogie.

achievementMessages.message: Dancing reduces depression, anxiety and stress. Set a reminder to stay happy.
achievementMessages.headline: Happy Dance!

achievementMessages.message: Grooving boosts self-esteem, body image and overall sense of well-being.
achievementMessages.headline: Groove on!

achievementMessages.message: Dancing reduces depression, anxiety and stress.
achievementMessages.headline: Happy Dance!

achievementMessages.message: Don’t forget: Schedule your groovin’ reminders so you don’t miss a beat!
achievementMessages.headline: Keep grooving and boogieing to a healthier you.

achievementMessages.message: Dancing has been shown to improve mood, reduce anxiety and increase self-esteem. Oh, and it’s fun too!
achievementMessages.headline: Nice job.

achievementMessages.message: Something to bear in mind: Dancing has been shown to reduce risk of dementia by as much as 76%.
achievementMessages.headline: You did it!

achievementMessages.message: Next time you “paws” to dance, grab a friend.
achievementMessages.headline: Rawr! Way to go. You’re a fierce dancing beast!

achievementMessages.message: Dancing helps us stay fit and flexible better than any other activity. Wild!
achievementMessages.headline: Nothing grizzly about that – you did it!

activitySubCategory.name: Dance
activitySubCategory.description: Boogie your way to a better you.

data.title: V for Victory Pose
data.text: Be more courageous by celebrating your small victories. Just 2 minutes is all you need to increase your confidence 20%. And do more by fearing less.

data.title: First, set your phone down to follow along.
Ready, set, pose for 1 min.
data.text: Stand with your feet nice and wide.

data.title: Lift your arms up, make a V.
Imagine the next finish line you’ll cross.
Half-way! That next to-do has nothing on you.
Jam out. You’re a rock star.

achievements.title: Be victorious with a V for Victory Pose Badge.
